plx:leadingInfo.plx:docComment: Gets the appropriate data adapter for the current database configuration
Instantiates a new instance of PersonDao
Retrieves the entire collection of Person objects
Retrieves the specified Personobject from the database
Inserts the given Person object into the database
Updates the given Person object in the database
Deletes the given Person object from the database
Instantiates a new instance of CountryDao
Retrieves the entire collection of Country objects
Retrieves the specified Countryobject from the database
Inserts the given Country object into the database
Updates the given Country object in the database
Deletes the given Country object from the database

plx:docComment.summary: Retrieves a collection of Person objects by the given Country object
